attributes.additional_details: Although I accept that the army needs to recruit members of the public, I fail to accept that the adverts it uses to recruit people need a.) to have such a similarity to video games like Call of Duty, and b.) need to  be shown at such an early time.  It is argued that swearing, drinking and sexual activity damage younger viewers, but | would argue that promoting war to younger viewers in many ways is far worse.It would be unreasonable to ask for army adverts to be removed off tv, but having them shown at a later time puts younger viewers in less of a vulnerable situation.
